name: Zombotron
description: Fight to survive on a mysterious alien planet, outwit its vicious inhabitants, and do whatever it takes to find a way off that wretched rock.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.3 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM
